revised_title: Plant Responses to Vacuum and Air Pressure: Experiments with Plants and Air Pumps
tldr: The author conducted experiments using air pumps to study the effects of vacuum and air pressure on plants. They discovered that plants can absorb water and nutrients through their roots and stems, and that air plays a crucial role in plant growth. The experiments also showed that different plants respond differently to changes in air pressure and vacuum conditions.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Physiology
